scripts.build: echo 'Please use: npm run build-all' && exit 1
scripts.build-all: npm run build:portfolio && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:portfolio
scripts.build:portfolio: cd portfolio && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --no-audit --no-fund && CI=false DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true npx react-scripts build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --no-audit --no-fund && npx react-scripts build
